benchmark_details.name: NEU-ESC (Vietnamese Educational Sentiment Classification and Topic Classification)
benchmark_details.overview: NEU-ESC is a new Vietnamese dataset for Educational Sentiment Classification and Topic Classification, curated from university forums that offers more samples, richer class diversity, longer texts, and broader vocabulary.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To create a new dataset from NEU students on social media platforms and demonstrate its utility for sentiment analysis and topic classification tasks.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset is currently imbalanced, with a predominant focus on 'Other' and 'Academic' topics, which may limit generalization.

data.source: Collected from university-related Facebook groups and community forums in Vietnam.
data.annotation: Manually curated with preprocessing to clean text and identify meaningful content.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on model predictions against ground truth labels in validation and test datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics indicate better performance in classifying sentiment and topics accurately.
methodology.baseline_results: Previous datasets UIT-VSFC, ViHSD, and ViCTSD.
methodology.validation: Data was split into training, validation, and test sets with specific ratios.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Demographic factors related to the student population engaging in discussions were noted but not deeply analyzed.
harm: Misclassification of sentiment and topic categories may lead to misunderstandings in educational contexts.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data collected from publicly available social media comments; no explicit privacy measures were discussed.
